text: Rapatea is a group of plants in the family Rapateaceae described as a genus in 1845.Aublet, Jean Baptiste Christophe Fusée. 1775. Histoire des Plantes de la Guiane Françoise vol 1, pages 305-307 in LatinAublet, Jean Baptiste Christophe Fusée. 1775. Histoire des Plantes de la Guiane Françoise vol 3, plate 118 line drawing as illustrationTropicos, Rapatea R.H.Schomb. The genus is native to Panama, Trinidad, and northern South America.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ; Species ==References== Category:Poales genera Category:Rapateaceae
title: Rapatea
